name: Negative Space Painter (VR/ASMR)
description:
Unveil your own amazing works of art by erasing matter in this relaxing VR art-making game with ASMR effects.

Desktop VR Required: This game requires VR and only works for desktop VR through OpenXR. When using SteamVR or Oculus desktop, make sure that platform is set to the default OpenXR platform. It also plays fine when streamed to Oculus Quest and Quest 2 through Oculus Link.

Controls

ControlActionTriggerPaint (Erase) / Activate ButtonSide GripDrag to flyThumbsticksWalk/Turn. Left stick: hop/teleport locomotion. Right stick: smooth locomotion.

Made in ~12 hours for 12 Days of Sketchmas 2022 Game Jam. I started this game in the final 5 hours of the jam so I didn't finish it in time to submit it for the jam. The themes from the jam that I used for this game are: hide, reveal, and paint.

There's no saving/loading of your creations yet, but if there is enough interest (i.e. donations) I'll add it. In the meantime, take and share screenshots and videos of your wonderful creations. 

For those of you asking about an Oculus Quest native build, I couldn't quite get the performance up to par with an Oculus Quest build. I might work on this more if there is enough interest. But you can stream it to your Quest via Oculus Link or Airlink.

Third Party Assets: Universal Sound FX library. Infinite Wonder by Kevin MacLeod (public domain license).
